name: EMA Trend High-Beta
description: 12/26 EMA crossover on high-beta tech stocks
rationale: EMA crossovers capture trend changes earlier than SMA. High-beta stocks (NVDA, TSLA, AMD, META) amplify momentum moves. The 12/26 combination is the MACD standard - fast EMA reacts to recent price action, slow EMA filters noise. When fast crosses above slow, it signals trend shift from bearish to bullish. Works best on volatile, trending stocks.
